about_the_game:
Embark on a cinematic story in an action-packed and thriving universe. The Legacy Collection 2024 unlocks access to over 50 Exotic rewards, the Strand subclass, as well as:

  • Lightfall Standard Edition*
  • The Witch Queen Standard Edition*
  • Beyond Light Pack**
  • Shadowkeep Pack**
  • Forsaken Pack
  • 30th Anniversary Pack
  • Pit of Heresy Dungeon
  • Shattered Throne Dungeon
  • Grasp of Avarice Dungeon

* Dungeon Keys for Lightfall and The Witch Queen are sold separately.

** The Beyond Light and Shadowkeep campaigns are open to all players in Destiny 2 and are not included in this pack.
